products.name: Paneer Butter Masala
products.description: Cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce with butter and Indian spices.

products.name: Vegetable Biryani
products.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with assorted vegetables, aromatic spices, and garnished with fried onions and fresh coriander.

products.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
products.description: Cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) marinated in spices, grilled, and then cooked in a flavorful tomato-based curry.

products.name: Dal Makhani
products.description: A rich and creamy lentil dish made with black lentils, kidney beans, butter, and Indian spices.

products.name: Vegetable Rogan Josh
products.description: Assorted vegetables slow-cooked in a spicy and aromatic curry with a blend of Indian spices.

products.name: Vegetable Korma
products.description: Assorted vegetables cooked in a creamy, mildly spiced cashew and coconut-based sauce.

products.name: Tandoori Vegetables
products.description: Assorted vegetables marinated in a blend of yogurt and spices, roasted to perfection in a tandoor (clay oven).

products.name: Aloo Gobi
products.description: Potatoes and cauliflower florets cooked with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.

products.name: Vegetable Curry
products.description: Assorted vegetables simmered in a tangy and spicy curry with coconut milk and South Indian spices.

products.name: Chana Masala
products.description: Chickpeas cooked in a flavorful tomato-based sauce with onions, garlic, and a blend of spices.

products.name: Vegetable Biryani
products.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with assorted vegetables, spices, and garnished with fried onions and mint.

products.name: Palak Paneer
products.description: Paneer cubes cooked in a creamy spinach sauce with ginger, garlic, and Indian spices.

products.name: Masala Dosa
products.description: Thin, crispy rice crepes filled with a spiced potato mixture, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

products.name: Uttapam
products.description: Thick rice pancake topped with vegetables like tomatoes, onions, and bell peppers, served with coconut chutney.

products.name: Rava Idli
products.description: Soft and fluffy semolina-based steamed cakes, served with coconut chutney and a variety of chutneys.

products.name: Gobi 65
products.description: Spicy and flavorful deep-fried cauliflower bites, a popular South Indian appetizer.

products.name: Pongal
products.description: Savory rice and lentil porridge, seasoned with black pepper, cumin, and garnished with ghee.

products.name: Coconut Rice
products.description: Fragrant rice cooked with grated coconut, mustard seeds, and curry leaves.

products.name: Mysore Pak
products.description: Sweet and melt-in-the-mouth fudge made with besan (chickpea flour), ghee, and sugar.

products.name: Vegetable Upma
products.description: A flavorful and hearty dish made from semolina (cream of wheat) cooked with assorted vegetables, tempered with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and garnished with cashews.

products.name: Avial
products.description: Mixed vegetables cooked in a coconut and yogurt-based gravy, flavored with curry leaves.

products.name: Pani Puri
products.description: Crispy hollow puris filled with a mixture of spicy, tangy tamarind water, mashed potatoes, and chickpeas.

products.name: Bhel Puri
products.description: A delightful street food snack made with puffed rice, sev, chopped vegetables, and tangy chutneys.

products.name: Samosa Chaat
products.description: Crushed samosas topped with yogurt, chutneys, and spices, creating a mouthwatering chaat experience.

products.name: Dahi Puri
products.description: Small, crisp puris filled with a mixture of yogurt, tamarind chutney, potatoes, and spices.

products.name: Papdi Chaat
products.description: Crunchy papdis topped with yogurt, mint chutney, tamarind chutney, potatoes, and sev.

products.name: Kachori Chaat
products.description: Deep-fried kachoris topped with yogurt, chutneys, and a mix of spices.

products.name: Ragda Pattice
products.description: Potato patties served with a spicy white peas curry (ragda) and topped with chutneys.

products.name: Chana Chaat
products.description: Chickpeas mixed with onions, tomatoes, spices, and chutneys, creating a flavorful and healthy chaat.

products.name: Aloo Tikki Chaat
products.description: Crispy potato patties topped with yogurt, chutneys, and sev, making a delightful chaat.

products.name: Gulab Jamun
products.description: Soft and spongy milk solids balls soaked in sugar syrup, garnished with pistachios or almonds.

products.name: Rasgulla
products.description: Spongy cottage cheese balls soaked in light sugar syrup, making them a delightful and refreshing dessert.

products.name: Jalebi
products.description: Deep-fried swirls of batter soaked in saffron-infused sugar syrup, creating a sweet and tangy treat.

products.name: Barfi
products.description: Sweet confectionery made with condensed milk, sugar, and various flavors like pistachio or coconut.

products.name: Ladoo
products.description: Round-shaped sweets made with various ingredients like gram flour, semolina, or coconut.

products.name: Kheer
products.description: Rice pudding cooked with milk, sugar, and flavored with cardamom, raisins, and nuts.

products.name: Halwa
products.description: A sweet dish made with various ingredients like semolina, carrots, or moong dal, cooked in ghee.

products.name: Peda
products.description: Small, round sweets made with condensed milk, khoya, and flavored with cardamom or saffron.

products.name: Gajar ka Halwa
products.description: A classic Indian dessert made with grated carrots, milk, sugar, and garnished with nuts.
